Intent: The user, Dmitriy, expects to turn off all TVs in the environment and switch on one specific meross-Light-Strip device designated as the fireplace light.  
Constraints & cues: The command involves controlling multiple devices, specifically turning off the Samsung The Frame TV and Samsung 8 Series TV, while identifying and activating the correct meross-Light-Strip for the fireplace light.

The current state of the devices indicates that the Samsung The Frame TV and Samsung 8 Series TV are both on, while all identified meross-Light-Strip devices are currently off. The fireplace light, which is assumed to be one of the meross-Light-Strip devices, is also off. To fulfill the command, the assistant will need to turn off the two TVs and switch on one of the meross-Light-Strip devices designated for the fireplace light.
